Html:
Just a simple little thank you to you, radioman.

This project has been incredibly helpful and is wonderfully full-featured. And you're really well engaged with the users of your project through CodePlex which is also extremely helpful.

So thank you for all the hard work and hours and congratulations on a ﻿truly amazingly project that is helping thousands of developers.
thanks, i try to help when i can/care, there is no final version, things keep changing, though sometimes slow, but direction is more important than speed ;}
